mnemonic: COMIDA = co-MEE-da - come to MEET the food!
cultural_note: Portuguese 'comida' is heart of culture - meals are social events!
'Bebidas' at Portuguese meals: wine for adults 'sumo' (juice) for kids!
Portuguese coffee culture: 'bica' in Lisbon 'cimbalino' in Porto!

mnemonic: CHÁ sounds like 'shah' - drink tea like a SHAH!
cultural_note: Portugal introduced tea to England - Catherine of Braganza!
'Com gás ou sem gás?' (with gas or without?) - sparkling or still!
'Galao' is Portuguese latte - mostly milk with espresso!

mnemonic: PÃO = powng - nasal sound like PONG with no G!
cultural_note: Portuguese bread is amazing - 'pão alentejano' is famous!
'Queijo da Serra' is famous Portuguese cheese - try it!

grammar_notes: Feminine noun. General word for meat.
cultural_note: Portuguese love meat - 'carne de porco à alentejana' is iconic!

mnemonic: PEIXE = PAY-sh - pay for the fish!
cultural_note: Portugal has highest fish consumption in Europe - 'bacalhau' is king!
Portuguese markets have amazing 'fruta' - 'pera rocha' pears are famous!
Portugal is 11th largest wine producer - Port wine vinho verde Douro!
tip: 'nh' like Spanish ñ - Portugal is famous for wine
